alert.note: Alert for La Paz; Yuma (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 12 at 1:29PM MST until August 12 at 4:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR NORTHWESTERN YUMA AND WEST CENTRAL LA PAZ COUNTIES... At 129 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms had produced heavy rain across the warned area. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Quartzsite. This includes the following highways... AZ Route 95 between mile markers 100 and 103...and between mile markers 104 and 112. AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 10 and 19. This includes the following streams and drainages... Cholla Wash, La, Apache Wash, Kaiser Wash, Paz Wash, La, Scaddan Wash, Ehrenberg Wash, Tyson Wash, Plomosa Wash, Weaver Wash, Smith Wash, Goodman Wash, Colorado River, French Creek and Poormans Wash. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
